description:
I found a misspelling in file ec2api_modwsgi.py. 

config_files = ['/etc/nova/api-paste.ini', '/etc/nova/nova.comf']

should be:

config_files = ['/etc/nova/api-paste.ini', '/etc/nova/nova.conf']
title: Misspelled config file name in ec2api_modwsgi.py

comments.content:
I found a misspelling in file ec2api_modwsgi.py. 

config_files = ['/etc/nova/api-paste.ini', '/etc/nova/nova.comf']

should be:

config_files = ['/etc/nova/api-paste.ini', '/etc/nova/nova.conf']
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mark-m-miller

comments.content:
I don't see any file by that name in trunk (commit 04bd3200b1ff251d60a76ed6b4132079da214c75)


$ git ls-files | grep ec2api_modwsgi
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Sorry, this is link to the page: 

https://github.com/rcbops-cookbooks/nova/blob/master/files/default/ec2api_modwsgi.py

Mark
